attributes.action: Say No to the third runway at Heathrow as a clear signal that UK is serious about climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allowing a third runway is incompatible with the evident necessity to reduce the number of flights before it would be usable. There are many regional airports that can take the strain in the meantime but long-term we MUST fly less than now.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Say No to the third runway at Heathrow as a clear signal that UK is serious about climate change."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22228


Prime Minister's Office
